main.name: Lisa Jia
main.occupation: Student with hopes to work in Technical Strategy
main.description: I'm a learner. A creator. A leader. A designer. A developer. An engineer.
main.bio: A Second Year Computer Science at the University of Western Ontario, I hope to pursue a career in project management or technical strategy/business operations. An avid learner, I'm passionate about learning new tech that will modernize everyday life and expanding my horizons of the ever-changing industry.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Take a look at some of my strongest technical skills!

education.degree: BS in Computer Science, HBA at the Ivey School of Business
education.description: Excelled in courses such as: Linear Algebra, Statistics, Data Structures and Algorithms, Intermediate Macro and Microeconomics, Managerial Economics
Graduated with 41/45 IB points; recieved the Board Equity Award and Rosanna Mandarino Award for outstanding leadership

work.company: Government of Ontario; Treasury Board Secretariat
work.title: Technical IT Assistant
work.description: Developed automated testing software in Python to perform frontend and regression testing; redesigned Government's website using HTML, Vue,js and React,js in VSCode

work.title: Junior Project Lead
work.description: Leads a group of 8 analysts to coordinate the planning and implementation of real-life projects; developed a project scope through the identification and analysis of client problem

projects.title: Women in Science Website

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
